D

decreaseArmyCount(int) - Method in class model.Country
This method is used to decrement the count of army and put the count in army numbers.
decreasenumberOfInitialArmies() - Method in class model.Player
This method is going to decrease the number of initial armies after each assigning in initial assigning step.
decreaseReinforcementArmy() - Method in class model.Player
This method is going to decrease the unassigned reinforcement armies count.
decreseArmyCount() - Method in class model.Country
This method is used to decrease the count of army.
deleteContinentFromMap(String) - Method in class model.MapModel
Delete continent from map.
deleteCountryFromMap(String) - Method in class model.MapModel
This method is used to delete country from map file.
depthFirstSearch(Country) - Method in class model.MapModel
This is a recursive function which implements DFS algorithm to visit ALL the vertices(countries) one by one starting from the first one = this is only possible if all the vertices are inter-connected store all the visited vertices(countries) in an arrayList 'visitedList'.
depthFirstSearchForContinent(Country) - Method in class model.MapModel
This is a recursive function which implements DFS algorithm to visit ALL the vertices(countries) one by one starting from the first one in One continent.
diceRoller(int) - Method in class model.Player
This method will roll a Dice.
displaymainMenu() - Static method in class controller.MainController
This is the method for Displaying main menu for game.
displayMapMenu() - Method in class views.MapView
This method displays menu for map generator.
dominationViewOn - Variable in class model.Game
